snippet: BARASH--Carolyn Uhlfelder, passed away peacefully on June 6th, surrounded by her loving family and dedicated caregivers, Karen, Martina, Carmen and Cherryl. Cherished wife of the late Michael, devoted mother to Jane Novick (Richard) and Barbara Barash. Beloved grandmother to Hillary Sherman (David) and Jeffrey Novick. Proud great-grandmother to Zachary and Matthew, "her special little boys." Private graveside service will be held on Wednesday. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BARASH--Carolyn Uhlfelder, passed away peacefully on June 6th, surrounded by her loving family and dedicated caregivers, Karen, Martina, Carmen and Cherryl. headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BARASH, CAROLYN UHLFELDER
